mapper.select: SELECT count(o.id) as count FROM cs_cancels o LEFT JOIN terminals t ON o.terminal_id = t.id WHERE o.customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY o.created_at DESC

SELECT o.id, o.created_at, o.status, t.serial_num, o.apply_num, gb.`name` AS brand_name, g.model_number AS brand_number, pc.`name` as zhifu_pt, m.title AS merchant_name, m.phone AS mer_phone FROM cs_cancels o LEFT JOIN terminals t ON o.terminal_id = t.id LEFT JOIN goods g ON t.good_id = g.id LEFT JOIN good_brands gb ON g.good_brands_id = gb.id LEFT JOIN pay_channels pc ON t.pay_channel_id = pc.id LEFT JOIN merchants m ON t.merchant_id = m.id WHERE o.customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY o.created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{rows}

SELECT o.id,o.templete_info_xml, o.`status` AS apply_status, o.created_at AS apply_time, t.serial_num,o.apply_num, gb.`name` AS brand_name, g.model_number AS brand_number, g.title as good_name, pc.`name` as zhifu_pt, m.title AS merchant_name, m.phone AS mer_phone FROM cs_cancels o LEFT JOIN terminals t ON o.terminal_id = t.id LEFT JOIN goods g ON t.good_id = g.id LEFT JOIN good_brands gb ON g.good_brands_id = gb.id LEFT JOIN pay_channels pc ON t.pay_channel_id = pc.id LEFT JOIN merchants m ON t.merchant_id = m.id WHERE o.id = #{id}
SELECT crm.content AS marks_content, crm.created_at, c.`name` AS marks_person FROM cs_cancel_marks crm LEFT JOIN customers c ON crm.customer_id = c.id WHERE crm.cs_cancel_id = #{id}

#{ids}
